data.system_settings: Macbook Pro (Mid-2010), macOS Sierra 10.12.6 ~ Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime, Android 7.0 Nougat ~ iPad 3rd Generation, iOS 9.3.2
data.actual_result: They aren't and just shows underscores, the first being in bold
data.short_description: Markdown characters that are in another markdown's scope aren't resolved (see attached) [Also happens on Android, iOS]
data.steps_to_repro: - Put markdown characters, eg two asterisks - Put text after it - Put other markdown characters, eg two underscores - Put text after it - Repeat this once
